page.title: 14Life Styles Census.
page.content: Stower Provost Schoolchildren delivered questionaires to all houses in the area.100 were collected.The findings are listed on page15. We visited 10 farms and sent a special questionaire to farms we were unable to visit.Results on page17. We also visited Carless Exploration, Custards Builders,Branksome Kennels, Mr Walter Rae,Todber Paving,Duncliffe Wood,Mayfield,and Mr Pavey. Wherever we visited we were welcomed and the whole neighbourhood responded to the questionaire. Parents helped by providing transport.
